SELECT tr.RES_RELATION_ID,tr.PARENT_RES_ID,tr.CHILD_RES_ID ,ts.RES_NAME,ts.RES_CODE,case when ro.role_id is null then 'false' else 'true' end CHECKED FROM T_RES_SELF_RELA tr LEFT JOIN T_RESOURCE ts on ts.RES_ID = tr.CHILD_RES_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ROLE_ID,RES_ID from T_ROLE_RES_RELA where ROLE_ID = (#role_id:VARCHAR#) and END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd') ) ro on ro.RES_ID = ts.RES_ID WHERE tr.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd') START WITH
tr.CHILD_RES_ID = (#parent_res_id:VARCHAR#)
tr.CHILD_RES_ID = 'RESC00000000000000000001'
CONNECT BY PRIOR tr.CHILD_RES_ID = tr.PARENT_RES_ID ORDER BY ts.RES_CODE asc
